sf:contextvar.name: run_mode
sf:contextvar.description: Mode in which to run

sf:contextvar.name: username
sf:contextvar.description: TIBCO ActiveMatrix Administrator username

sf:contextvar.name: admin_realm_type
sf:contextvar.description: TIBCO ActiveMatrix Administrator authentication realm. For LDAP, ensure the administrator user exists in your LDAP server.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_machine_name_port_list
sf:contextvar.description: Comma-separated list of LDAP server URLs in [host]:[port] format

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_bind_dn_name
sf:contextvar.description: Distinguished name of the superuser to be used to connect to the LDAP server

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_context_factory
sf:contextvar.description: Factory object that provides the starting point for resolution of names within the LDAP server.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_user_search_base_dn
sf:contextvar.description: Base distinguished name from which the search starts.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_user_search_expression
sf:contextvar.description: Expression used for searching a user. For example: (CN=%U). '%U' is replaced by the username being searched for. You can define any complex filter such as (&(cn=%U)(objectClass=account)).

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_user_attribute_with_user_name
sf:contextvar.description: Name of the attribute in the user object that contains the user's name.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_search_timeout
sf:contextvar.description: Time to wait for a response from the LDAP server.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_follow_referrals
sf:contextvar.description: Select to follow LDAP referrals. If you select this check box, requests to LDAP can be redirected to another server.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_group_indication
sf:contextvar.description: Specifies how a userâ€™s group memberships are found.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_group_search_base_dn
sf:contextvar.description: Base distinguished name from which the search for the group starts.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_group_search_expression
sf:contextvar.description: Search by matching this expression against potential groups.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_group_attribute_with_user_names
sf:contextvar.description: Name of the attribute in the group object containing its users.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_group_attribute_with_group_name
sf:contextvar.description: Name of the attribute in the group object that contains the name of the group.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_group_attribute_with_subgroup_names
sf:contextvar.description: Name of the attribute in the group object that contains its subgroups.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_user_attribute_with_group_names
sf:contextvar.description: Name of the attribute in the user object that lists the groups to which the user belongs.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_group_search_scope_subtree
sf:contextvar.description: Whether to traverse into the subtree or to search only under the group base distinguished name.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_user_search_scope_subtree
sf:contextvar.description: Select to have the search include the entire subtree starting at the base DN. Otherwise, search only the nodes one level below the base DN.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_security_authentication
sf:contextvar.description: Value of Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) authentication protocol to use

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_ssl_enabled
sf:contextvar.description: Whether LDAP server is SSL enabled

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_ssl_trust_store_type
sf:contextvar.description: The type of the LDAP trust store

sf:contextvar.name: admin_enterprise_name
sf:contextvar.description: TIBCO ActiveMatrix Administrator enterprise name

sf:contextvar.name: admin_instance_name
sf:contextvar.description: TIBCO ActiveMatrix Administrator server instance name

sf:contextvar.name: admin_external_http_port_base
sf:contextvar.description: Admin server external http port

sf:contextvar.name: admin_internal_http_port_base
sf:contextvar.description: Admin server internal http port

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_internal_ldap_port_base
sf:contextvar.description: BPM server internal LDAP port

sf:contextvar.name: system_host_management_port_base
sf:contextvar.description: System host management port

sf:contextvar.name: system_node_management_port_base
sf:contextvar.description: System node management port

sf:contextvar.name: dev_node_management_port_base
sf:contextvar.description: Dev node management port

sf:contextvar.name: admin_cs_port
sf:contextvar.description: Credential server port

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ems_url
sf:contextvar.description: Notification and Messaging Bus Server

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ems_username
sf:contextvar.description: The user name of Messaging Bus Server

sf:contextvar.name: sslEnabled
sf:contextvar.description: Display SSL Configuration page

sf:contextvar.name: server_keystore_type
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator server keystore type

sf:contextvar.name: server_truststore_type
sf:contextvar.description: Type of the truststore

sf:contextvar.name: serverconnsetting_keyalias
sf:contextvar.description: Connection Settings keystore alias

sf:contextvar.name: DEPLOYMENT_DIRECTORY
sf:contextvar.description: Location where the distribution and deployment configuration will be published

sf:contextvar.name: PRESERVE_DEPLOYMENT_ON_SHUTDOWN
sf:contextvar.description: Keep the deployment after a shutdown for the next restart

sf:contextvar.name: admin_db_usedefault
sf:contextvar.description: Whether administrator database uses the default

sf:contextvar.name: customizeSizing
sf:contextvar.description: Customize size of Connection Pool, Statement Cache etc.

sf:contextvar.name: amx_ems_usedefault
sf:contextvar.description: Requires a running EMS Component for ActiveMatrix BPM

sf:contextvar.name: select_connection_factory
sf:contextvar.description: Select a new Connection Factory for EMS

sf:contextvar.name: ems_factory_name
sf:contextvar.description: Default EMS Connection Factory Name

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jms_usedefault
sf:contextvar.description: Use the same EMS Server as the ActiveMatrix Administrator

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jms_usedependency
sf:contextvar.description: Use a dependency on a TIBCO EMS component

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_ldap_usedefault
sf:contextvar.description: Use the default LDAP for ActiveMatrix BPM

sf:contextvar.name: customize_bpm_node
sf:contextvar.description: Customize BPM Node settings

sf:contextvar.name: deploy_monitoring_service
sf:contextvar.description: Deploy Monitoring Service

sf:contextvar.name: deploy_log_service
sf:contextvar.description: Deploy Log Service -- NOTE: Requires Monitoring Service

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_disabled
sf:contextvar.description: Disable MCR

sf:contextvar.name: common_logging_disabled
sf:contextvar.description: CommonLogging Disabled

sf:contextvar.name: db_type
sf:contextvar.description: The type of the Administrator database. Valid values are Oracle 11g and Microsoft SQL Server 4.0.0

sf:contextvar.name: admin_db_url
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator server external database url

sf:contextvar.name: admin_db_username
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator server external database user name

sf:contextvar.name: admin_db_maxconnections
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator server external database max connections

sf:contextvar.name: use_different_database_for_logging
sf:contextvar.description: Use different databases for logging and monitoring

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_db_usedefault
sf:contextvar.description: Use ActiveMatrix Administrator database

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_db_type
sf:contextvar.description: The type of supported database. Valid values are Oracle 11g and Microsoft SQL Server 4.0.0

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_db_url
sf:contextvar.description: Monitoring database url

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_db_username
sf:contextvar.description: Monitoring database user name

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_db_maxconnections
sf:contextvar.description: Monitoring database max connections

sf:contextvar.name: logging_db_usedefault
sf:contextvar.description: Use ActiveMatrix Administrator database

sf:contextvar.name: logging_db_type
sf:contextvar.description: The type of supported database. Valid values are Oracle 11g and Microsoft SQL Server 4.0.0

sf:contextvar.name: logging_db_url
sf:contextvar.description: Log Service database url

sf:contextvar.name: logging_db_username
sf:contextvar.description: Log Service database user name

sf:contextvar.name: logging_db_maxconnections
sf:contextvar.description: Log Service database max connections

sf:contextvar.name: payload_db_usedefault
sf:contextvar.description: Use ActiveMatrix Administrator database

sf:contextvar.name: payload_db_type
sf:contextvar.description: The type of supported database. Valid values are Oracle 11g and Microsoft SQL Server 4.0.0

sf:contextvar.name: payload_db_url
sf:contextvar.description: Payload Service database url

sf:contextvar.name: payload_db_username
sf:contextvar.description: Payload Service database user name

sf:contextvar.name: payload_db_maxconnections
sf:contextvar.description: Payload Service database max connections

sf:contextvar.name: secure_bpm_client
sf:contextvar.description: Enable SSL for BPM HTTP Port

sf:contextvar.name: bpmclient_keyalias
sf:contextvar.description: BPM Client Key alias

sf:contextvar.name: secure_bpm_jms
sf:contextvar.description: BPM JMS Connection is SSL Enabled

sf:contextvar.name: secure_bpm_ldap
sf:contextvar.description: BPM LDAP Server is SSL Enabled

sf:contextvar.name: secure_admin_http
sf:contextvar.description: Enable SSL on external HTTP communication channel

sf:contextvar.name: secure_ems_channel
sf:contextvar.description: Connect to EMS Server that is SSL enabled

sf:contextvar.name: secure_db_channel
sf:contextvar.description: Connect to Administrator database(s) that are SSL enabled

sf:contextvar.name: secure_ldap_channel
sf:contextvar.description: Connect to ldap that are SSL enabled

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_ems_usedefault
sf:contextvar.description: Use the ActiveMatrix Administrator EMS

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_ems_url
sf:contextvar.description: MCR EMS url

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_ems_username
sf:contextvar.description: MCR EMS username

sf:contextvar.name: mcr_ems_password
sf:contextvar.description: MCR EMS password

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_db_type
sf:contextvar.description: Select a supported ActiveMatrix BPM Server Database.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_admin_db_url
sf:contextvar.description: JDBC connection string for the selected database server.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_admin_db_url_oracle11g
sf:contextvar.description: Format is jdbc:oracle:thin:@[HostName]:[Port]:[ServiceID] or jdbc:oracle:thin:@//[HostName]:[Port]/[ServiceName]

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_admin_db_url_mssql4
sf:contextvar.description: Format is jdbc:sqlserver://[HostName]:[Port];DatabaseName=[DBName];SelectMethod=cursor

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_admin_db_username
sf:contextvar.description: DB user account must have system administrator privileges.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_admin_db_tablespace
sf:contextvar.description: Tablespace where ActiveMatrix BPM database will be created.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_runtime_db_url
sf:contextvar.description: JDBC connection string that ActiveMatrix BPM should use to connect to the ActiveMatrix BPM database.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_runtime_db_username
sf:contextvar.description: Database server user account that ActiveMatrix BPM should use to connect to the ActiveMatrix BPM database.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_bds_db_owndatabase
sf:contextvar.description: Whether or not to use separate database from other AMX-BPM components for BDS

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_bds_db_url
sf:contextvar.description: JDBC connection string that ActiveMatrix BPM should use to connect to the ActiveMatrix BPM BDS database.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_bds_db_username
sf:contextvar.description: Database server user account that ActiveMatrix BPM should use to connect to the ActiveMatrix BPM BDS database.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_bds_db_tablespace_name
sf:contextvar.description: Tablespace name for the BPM BDS database.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_app_name
sf:contextvar.description: BPM application name.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_http_host
sf:contextvar.description: Name used to externally identify the machine that hosts ActiveMatrix BPM.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_http_port
sf:contextvar.description: HTTP port number used by this BPM node for communication with external clients.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_soap_binding_version
sf:contextvar.description: SOAP Binding version (BPM 3.x or later)

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_smtp_host
sf:contextvar.description: Name of the machine that hosts the SMTP server.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_smtp_port
sf:contextvar.description: Port number on which the SMTP server is running.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jms_type
sf:contextvar.description: Type of the EMS Server used by ActiveMatrix BPM.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jms_url
sf:contextvar.description: The URL of the EMS server to be used by ActiveMatrix BPM.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jms_context
sf:contextvar.description: The initial context factory to use for the JNDI lookup of the EMS server.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jms_factory
sf:contextvar.description: The name of the connection factory used to create the connection to the EMS server.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jms_queue
sf:contextvar.description: The name of the EMS server queue that ActiveMatrix BPM uses to receive messages.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jms_username
sf:contextvar.description: The username of the EMS server used by ActiveMatrix BPM.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_ldap_url
sf:contextvar.description: URL used to log in to the external LDAP server.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_ldap_basedn
sf:contextvar.description: Base Distinguished Name (DN) from which to search/navigate the LDAP directory.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_ldap_username
sf:contextvar.description: Distinguished Name of the LDAP user who will be used as the tibco-admin user.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_envt_name
sf:contextvar.description: Name of the environment that contains the BPM node.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_node_name
sf:contextvar.description: Name of the BPM node.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_node_port
sf:contextvar.description: Management port number used by the node.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_sizing_install
sf:contextvar.description: Type of environment being set up.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_database_pool
sf:contextvar.description: Number of database connections available for each of the AMX BPM DataSource resource templates.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_database_cache
sf:contextvar.description: Number of prepared statements that can be cached by each connection in the DataSource resource template pool.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_pvm_threads
sf:contextvar.description: Number of threads in the Process Engine background thread pool.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jvm_perm
sf:contextvar.description: Maximum size for Java PermGen.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_message_core
sf:contextvar.description: Minimum range for the message threads.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_message_max
sf:contextvar.description: Maximum range for the message threads.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jvm_xms
sf:contextvar.description: Minimum range for the Java heap size.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jvm_xmx
sf:contextvar.description: Maximum range for the Java heap size.

sf:contextvar.name: REBIND_HOST_POOL_PERIOD
sf:contextvar.description: Polling period in ms to check if a dependent AMX runtime has moved from a machine to another to rebind the TIBCOHost

sf:contextvar.name: admin_cs_username
sf:contextvar.description: Username for the TIBCO Credential Server

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_amx_admin_use_dependency
sf:contextvar.description: Whether to use a component dependency on a BPM Server component with Run Mode set to either 'ActiveMatrix Administrator Only' or 'ActiveMatrix Administrator and BPM Server'

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_amx_admin_hostname
sf:contextvar.description: The hostname of the ActiveMatrix Administrator

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_amx_admin_port
sf:contextvar.description: The port of the ActiveMatrix Administrator

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_amx_admin_username
sf:contextvar.description: The username of the ActiveMatrix Administrator

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_amx_admin_ems_url
sf:contextvar.description: The URL of the EMS Server used by the ActiveMatrix Administrator

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_amx_admin_ems_username
sf:contextvar.description: The username of the EMS Server used by the ActiveMatrix Administrator

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_use_cmis_repository
sf:contextvar.description: Whether to configure a Content Management Interoperability Services (CMIS) repository

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_cmis_url
sf:contextvar.description: URL of the external CMIS Server

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_cmis_binding_type
sf:contextvar.description: The CMIS Binding Type

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_cmis_repository_id
sf:contextvar.description: The ID of the external CMIS repository

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_cmis_folder_path
sf:contextvar.description: The folder path in the CMIS repository

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_cmis_admin_user
sf:contextvar.description: Username for the CMIS server

sf:contextvar.name: admin_dbrealm_usedefault
sf:contextvar.description: Use ActiveMatrix Administrator database for authentication realm

sf:contextvar.name: admin_db_auth_realm_type
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator authentication realm database type

sf:contextvar.name: admin_db_auth_realm_url
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator authentication realm url

sf:contextvar.name: admin_db_auth_realm_username
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator authentication realm username

sf:contextvar.name: admin_db_auth_realm_maxconnections
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator authentication realm max connections

sf:contextvar.name: tibcohost_jmx_port_base
sf:contextvar.description: The jmx port of tibcohost instance

sf:contextvar.name: bpmclient_keystore_type
sf:contextvar.description: BPM keystore type

sf:contextvar.name: admin_tibcohost_nodejvmargs
sf:contextvar.description: JVM arguments for Administrator tibcohost

sf:contextvar.name: USE_TIBCOHOST_SUBDIRECTORY_FOR_DEPLOY_DIR
sf:contextvar.description: Whether to use a subdirectory of the specified deployment directory based on the TIBCO Host name.

sf:contextvar.name: password
sf:contextvar.description: TIBCO ActiveMatrix Administrator password

sf:contextvar.description: LDAP server password

sf:contextvar.name: admin_ldap_auth_realm_ssl_trust_store_password
sf:contextvar.description: The password for the LDAP trust store

sf:contextvar.description: The password of Messaging Bus Server

sf:contextvar.name: server_keystore_password
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator server keystore password

sf:contextvar.name: server_truststore_password
sf:contextvar.description: Password for the truststore

sf:contextvar.name: serverconnsetting_keypassword
sf:contextvar.description: Connection Settings key password

sf:contextvar.name: admin_db_password
sf:contextvar.description: Administrator server external database password

sf:contextvar.description: Monitoring database password

sf:contextvar.name: logging_db_password
sf:contextvar.description: Log Service database password

sf:contextvar.name: payload_db_password
sf:contextvar.description: Payload Service database password

sf:contextvar.name: bpmclient_keypassword
sf:contextvar.description: BPM Client Key password

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_admin_db_password
sf:contextvar.description: Password for the specified DBA Username.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_runtime_db_password
sf:contextvar.description: Password for the specified Username.

sf:contextvar.name: confirm_bpm_runtime_db_password
sf:contextvar.description: Password for the specified Username.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_bds_db_password
sf:contextvar.description: Password for the specified BDS database Username.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_jms_password
sf:contextvar.description: The password of the EMS server used by ActiveMatrix BPM.

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_ldap_password
sf:contextvar.description: Password of the specified LDAP user.

sf:contextvar.name: admin_cs_password
sf:contextvar.description: Password for the TIBCO Credential Server

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_amx_admin_password
sf:contextvar.description: The password of the ActiveMatrix Administrator

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_amx_admin_ems_password
sf:contextvar.description: The password of the EMS Server used by the ActiveMatrix Administrator

sf:contextvar.name: bpm_cmis_admin_user_password
sf:contextvar.description: Password for the CMIS user
